name: The Outbreak (Robo)
description:
A short story-based horror game, The Outbreak is my first game made with Unity, built to showcase my knowledge of code, graphic design, music, creativity and more. I am close to finishing it off and I'm looking forward to working on larger games like this in the future. I'd love to hear your feedback!

Please note that this game is still Being Tested, so any features that seem incomplete or even broken, may still be being worked on. Either way, I appreciate any and all feedback, it will help make the finished product even better.

Developed & Created by Robo Games
